Disease.Name: METHYLMALONIC ACIDURIA (MMA)
Disease.Synonym: METHYLMALONACIDURIA DUE TO METHYLMALONIC COA MUTASE; ACIDEMIA, METHYLMALONIC
Disease.Summary: rare (1:50000 );autosomal recessive;caused by mutation in the gene encoding methylmalonyl-CoA mutase (MUT) ;mut0 and mut- defects, the latter with milder course

symtomp.category: IMMUNE OR HEMATOLOGIC SYSTEM | LABORATORY FINDINGS

symtomp.symptom: basal ganglia, changes, lesions, calcifications (MRI, CT)
behavior, hyperactive, restless / behaviour, hyperactive, restless
malignant tumor (e.g., Wilms tumor, hepatoblastoma, neuroblastoma, and rhabdomyosarcoma)Wilms)

symtomp.category: IMMUNE OR HEMATOLOGIC SYSTEM | LABORATORY FINDINGS

symtomp.symptom: no clinical symptoms (probably) / no clinical significance

symtomp.category: CARDIOVASCULAR SYSTEM | LUNG OR RESPIRATORY SYSTEM
LUNG OR RESPIRATORY SYSTEM | NERVOUS SYSTEM
LUNG OR RESPIRATORY SYSTEM | NERVOUS SYSTEM
